caption: This photograph captures a scene of significant destruction likely caused by a natural disaster such as a flood or storm. The setting shows a waterlogged area littered with debris. The foreground is dominated by a partially submerged and damaged white boat resting tilted atop large amounts of wreckage, including broken wood, metal pieces, and other materials. The background features muddy water that extends towards a stand of dense, green trees, some of which also appear to be damaged or leaning precariously as a result of the event. No people are visible in the image, highlighting the aftermath and quiet desolation following the destructive event. The lighting suggests it is a clear day, which contrasts starkly with the chaos depicted in the scene.
title: Part of widespread damage caused by flooding of guadalupe river
